title: Former Theranos exec Sunny Balwani loses bid to remain out of prison during appeals
description: A federal judge has rejected former Theranos executive Ramesh “Sunny” Balwani’s bid to remain free.

title: Crisis at Silicon Valley Bank shows tech sector worries spilling onto Wall Street
description: Tech sector fallout is spilling into the banking industry, as investors gauge the odds of survival for Silicon Valley Bank, a major startup lender.

title: Rupert Murdoch discussed buying rights to 'The Apprentice' after Trump's 2020 loss
description: Fox Corp. Chairman Rupert Murdoch discussed buying the rights to Donald Trump's reality show "The Apprentice" in the weeks after the 2020 presidential election.

title: Fox News blacked-out too much in court documents, say Dominion and media outlets
description: Lawyers for Dominion Voting Systems and a group of media outlets are arguing that Fox News abused the redaction process in the defamation case its facing.

title: The FCC could choose to act against Rupert Murdoch for Fox News’ election lies, but few expect it to
description: The primary U.S. media regulator doesn’t have much it can do to punish Fox News for spreading false claims about the 2020 election.
